title: What's the deal with Katarina? VA question.
body: Isn't she one of your flagship characters? She has so much lore tied in her but none of it gets explored because she can't talk. She just spouts 1 liners over and over. Can she get a VA update or can you not afford Tara Platt anymore? Why does she get like a billion skins and NEVER one that gives her new lines? Ever.
